tool_description:
Tired of field testing your geolocation based mobile apps? Wish you could see how your app would work if a user is walking or driving around with it? Want an easy way to test your app in random areas (geofences), random streets? Use our REST APIs in your app. Code locally, test globally. 

Use our web platform to buy API credits: https://apps.geolocationtech.com/login
title: Geolocation Simulation For Mobile Apps

api_list.name: Forgot Password
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nisostech-geosimulator-apis-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/forgot"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nisostech-geosimulator-apis-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.description: View Profile (Enter your user-id in route)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nisostech-geosimulator-apis-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/user/user-id"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nisostech-geosimulator-apis-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
